analysis.key_quote: Schedule F would allow the executive branch to reclassify tens of thousands of career federal employees as “at-will,” stripping them of their statutory job protections under the Civil Service Reform Act of 1978.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the reinstatement of Schedule F, citing concerns about undermining the merit-based civil service system, due process violations, and the potential for politicization of federal employment.
